tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EnergyEfficiencyMetrics (
    metric_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255),
    metric_description TEXT,
    metric_value FLOAT,
    architect_id INT
);
CREATE TABLE Building ( building_id INT PRIMARY KEY, building_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, architect_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, energy_rating INT NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumption ( consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY, building_id INT NOT NULL, date DATE NOT NULL, energy_usage FLOAT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES Building(building_id) ON DELETE CASCADE );

CREATE TABLE CarbonFootprint ( footprint_id INT PRIMARY KEY, building_id INT NOT NULL, date DATE NOT NULL, carbon_emission FLOAT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES Building(building_id) ON DELETE CASCADE );

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    building_id INT,
    architect_id INT,
    completion_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE energy_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    energy_consumption FLOAT,
    energy_generation FLOAT,
    carbon_footprint FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption(
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id UUID,
    consumption_date DATE,
    energy_usage FLOAT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_building FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES building_designs(building_id)
);
